page.title: 15Health,Earlston
page.content: In Earlston we have a very good{Health {Centre.}There are two doctors and sometimes there are assistant doctors who are doing their training.There are three district nurses.We also have an ambulance service.This goes to the day centre at the Health Centre.We now also have a dental surgery.We have no hospital but patients are taken to Peel,Galashiels or Edinburgh. There are a lot of home helps in Earlston.They go into old people's houses to do their housework,cook meals, do washing and sometimes do the garden.Over all,Earlston has very good Health Services.
